file.name: schema.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  title: ''
  version: ''
paths:
  /api/games/:
    get:
      operationId: listGames
      description: ''
      parameters:
      - name: page
        required: false
        in: query
        description: A page number within the paginated result set.
        schema:
          type: integer
      - name: search
        required: false
        in: query
        description: A search term.
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  count:
                    type: integer
                    example: 123
                  next:
                    type: string
                    nullable: true
                  previous:
                    type: string
                    nullable: true
                  results:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      properties:
                        title:
                          type: string
                          maxLength: 250
                        description:
                          type: string
                          description: Enter a brief description of the game
                          maxLength: 1000
                        cover:
                          type: string
                          maxLength: 500
                        developer:
                          type: string
                          maxLength: 150
                        publisher:
                          type: string
                          maxLength: 150
                        director:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
                          readOnly: true
                        genre:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
                          readOnly: true
                        platform:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
                          readOnly: true
                        release_date:
                          type: string
                          format: date
                          nullable: true
                      required:
                      - title
                      - description
          description: ''
  /api/games/{id}/:
    get:
      operationId: retrieveGame
      description: ''
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        description: A unique integer value identifying this game.
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: search
        required: false
        in: query
        description: A search term.
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                properties:
                  title:
                    type: string
                    maxLength: 250
                  description:
                    type: string
                    description: Enter a brief description of the game
                    maxLength: 1000
                  cover:
                    type: string
                    maxLength: 500
                  developer:
                    type: string
                    maxLength: 150
                  publisher:
                    type: string
                    maxLength: 150
                  director:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: string
                    readOnly: true
                  genre:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: string
                    readOnly: true
                  platform:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: string
                    readOnly: true
                  release_date:
                    type: string
                    format: date
                    nullable: true
                required:
                - title
                - description
          description: ''
  /api/platforms/:
    get:
      operationId: listPlatforms
      description: ''
      parameters:
      - name: page
        required: false
        in: query
        description: A page number within the paginated result set.
        schema:
          type: integer
      - name: search
        required: false
        in: query
        description: A search term.
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  count:
                    type: integer
                    example: 123
                  next:
                    type: string
                    nullable: true
                  previous:
                    type: string
                    nullable: true
                  results:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      properties:
                        name:
                          type: string
                          maxLength: 200
                        developer:
                          type: string
                          maxLength: 200
                        generation:
                          enum:
                          - 1st
                          - 2nd
                          - 3rd
                          - 4th
                          - 5th
                          - 6th
                          - 7th
                          - 8th
                          - 9th
                          description: Video Game Generation
                        media:
                          type: string
                          maxLength: 100
                        cpu:
                          type: string
                          maxLength: 100
                        release_date:
                          type: string
                          format: date
                          nullable: true
                      required:
                      - name
                      - developer
                      - generation
                      - media
                      - cpu
          description: ''
  /api/platforms/{id}/:
    get:
      operationId: retrievePlatform
      description: ''
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        description: A unique integer value identifying this platform.
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: search
        required: false
        in: query
        description: A search term.
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                properties:
                  name:
                    type: string
                    maxLength: 200
                  developer:
                    type: string
                    maxLength: 200
                  generation:
                    enum:
                    - 1st
                    - 2nd
                    - 3rd
                    - 4th
                    - 5th
                    - 6th
                    - 7th
                    - 8th
                    - 9th
                    description: Video Game Generation
                  media:
                    type: string
                    maxLength: 100
                  cpu:
                    type: string
                    maxLength: 100
                  release_date:
                    type: string
                    format: date
                    nullable: true
                required:
                - name
                - developer
                - generation
                - media
                - cpu
          description: ''
  /api/screenshots/:
    get:
      operationId: listScreenshots
      description: ''
      parameters:
      - name: page
        required: false
        in: query
        description: A page number within the paginated result set.
        schema:
          type: integer
      - name: search
        required: false
        in: query
        description: A search term.
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  count:
                    type: integer
                    example: 123
                  next:
                    type: string
                    nullable: true
                  previous:
                    type: string
                    nullable: true
                  results:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      properties:
                        game:
                          type: string
                        screenshot_1:
                          type: string
                          maxLength: 500
                        screenshot_2:
                          type: string
                          maxLength: 500
                        screenshot_3:
                          type: string
                          maxLength: 500
                        screenshot_4:
                          type: string
                          maxLength: 500
                      required:
                      - game
                      - screenshot_1
                      - screenshot_2
                      - screenshot_3
                      - screenshot_4
          description: ''
  /api/screenshots/{id}/:
    get:
      operationId: retrieveScreenshot
      description: ''
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        description: Unique ID for this particular genre
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: search
        required: false
        in: query
        description: A search term.
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                properties:
                  game:
                    type: string
                  screenshot_1:
                    type: string
                    maxLength: 500
                  screenshot_2:
                    type: string
                    maxLength: 500
                  screenshot_3:
                    type: string
                    maxLength: 500
                  screenshot_4:
                    type: string
                    maxLength: 500
                required:
                - game
                - screenshot_1
                - screenshot_2
                - screenshot_3
                - screenshot_4
          description: ''
  /api/directors/:
    get:
      operationId: listDirectors
      description: ''
      parameters:
      - name: page
        required: false
        in: query
        description: A page number within the paginated result set.
        schema:
          type: integer
      - name: search
        required: false
        in: query
        description: A search term.
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  count:
                    type: integer
                    example: 123
                  next:
                    type: string
                    nullable: true
                  previous:
                    type: string
                    nullable: true
                  results:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      properties:
                        id:
                          type: integer
                          readOnly: true
                        name:
                          type: string
                          maxLength: 200
                        born_country:
                          type: string
                          maxLength: 150
                      required:
                      - name
          description: ''
  /api/directors/{id}/:
    get:
      operationId: retrieveDirector
      description: ''
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        description: A unique integer value identifying this director.
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: search
        required: false
        in: query
        description: A search term.
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: integer
                    readOnly: true
                  name:
                    type: string
                    maxLength: 200
                  born_country:
                    type: string
                    maxLength: 150
                required:
                - name
          description: ''
  /api/genres/:
    get:
      operationId: listGenres
      description: ''
      parameters:
      - name: page
        required: false
        in: query
        description: A page number within the paginated result set.
        schema:
          type: integer
      - name: search
        required: false
        in: query
        description: A search term.
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  count:
                    type: integer
                    example: 123
                  next:
                    type: string
                    nullable: true
                  previous:
                    type: string
                    nullable: true
                  results:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      properties:
                        id:
                          type: integer
                          readOnly: true
                        name:
                          type: string
                          maxLength: 200
                      required:
                      - name
          description: ''
  /api/genres/{id}/:
    get:
      operationId: retrieveGenre
      description: ''
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        description: A unique integer value identifying this genre.
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: search
        required: false
        in: query
        description: A search term.
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: integer
                    readOnly: true
                  name:
                    type: string
                    maxLength: 200
                required:
                - name
          description: ''
